movies.title: Ruby
movies.plot: Fact and fiction are combined in this story about Jack Ruby and a stripper, Candy Cane, and how they become involved in a conspiracy to kill J.F.K.

events.title: Jack Ruby dies of a blood clot
Jack Ruby is sentenced to death
Jack Ruby kills Lee Harvey Oswald

movies.title: Malcolm X
movies.plot: A tribute to the controversial black activist and leader of the struggle for black liberation. He hit bottom during his imprisonment in the '50s, he became a Black Muslim and then a leader in the Nation of Islam. His assassination in 1965 left a legacy of self-determination and racial pride.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.title: Chaplin
movies.plot: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 16 nominations.

movies.title: The Babe
movies.plot: A chronicle of Babe Ruth's phenomenal story--from his hard knock beginnings at a Baltimore orphanage, to his meteoric rise to baseball superstardom and his poignant retirement from the game. His amazing career included seven American League pennants, four World Series championships, two tempestuous marriages and a wild lifestyle that earned him numerous suspensions.

events.title: Babe Ruth hits a home run for an injured boy, Johnny Sylvester

movies.title: Fool's Gold: The Story Of The Brink's Mat Robbery
movies.plot: A dramatized speculation of what happened in November 1983 when Micky McAvoy and some of his mates planned a heist and were surprised when they discovered they'd stumbled across a large stash of gold. But getting the gold away without getting caught is only the beginning of their troubles. Realizing the riches the gold represents is difficult, and honor among thieves may only be a myth.

movies.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
movies.plot: A retelling of the classic Dickens tale of Ebenezer Scrooge, miser extraordinaire. He is held accountable for his dastardly ways during night-time visitations by the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present, and future.

movies.title: Batman Returns
movies.plot: Having defeated the Joker, Batman now faces the Penguin—a warped and deformed individual who is intent on being accepted into Gotham society, with the help of Max Schreck, a crooked businessman, whom he coerces into helping him run for the position of Mayor of Gotham, while they both attempt to frame Batman in a different light. Batman must attempt to clear his name, all while also deciding just what must be done with the mysterious Catwoman slinking about.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 27 nominations.
